item.description:
Type 9 Peacemaker Workshop - Also, How to Relate to 9s

Learn everything there is to learn about 9s, strengths, defenses, growth and development, relationship dynamics, subtypes of 9. Perfect for 9s, anyone in relationship to a 9, and anyone who wants to learn more about 9s.

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm

(Traditional cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20)


Herb Pearce is an expert in the Enneagram having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in the last 20 years and he is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. Herb's uses the Enneagram in his therapy and coaching practice for individuals, couples and families.

www.herbpearce.com for full list of workshops and to sign up for weekly email newsletter
item.name: Type 9 Peacemaker Workshop - also How to Relate to 9s
